scripts.gen-types: npm run gen-types:pos && npm run gen-types:product && npm run gen-types:hrms && npm run gen-types:inventory && npm run gen-types:purchase && npm run gen-types:logistics && npm run gen-types:accounting && npm run gen-types:auth && npm run gen-types:promotion && npm run gen-types:customer && npm run gen-types:notification && npm run gen-types:payment && npm run gen-types:company && npm run gen-types:asset && npm run gen-types:quality && npm run gen-types:reporting && npm run gen-types:intel
scripts.gen-types:pos: docker compose exec pos python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > pos-schema.json && openapi-typescript pos-schema.json -o src/types/pos-api.d.ts && rm pos-schema.json
scripts.gen-types:product: docker compose exec product python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > product-schema.json && openapi-typescript product-schema.json -o src/types/product-api.d.ts && rm product-schema.json
scripts.gen-types:hrms: docker compose exec hrms-service python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > hrms-schema.json && openapi-typescript hrms-schema.json -o src/types/hrms-api.d.ts && rm hrms-schema.json
scripts.gen-types:inventory: docker compose exec inventory python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > inventory-schema.json && openapi-typescript inventory-schema.json -o src/types/inventory-api.d.ts && rm inventory-schema.json
scripts.gen-types:purchase: docker compose exec purchase python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > purchase-schema.json && openapi-typescript purchase-schema.json -o src/types/purchase-api.d.ts && rm purchase-schema.json

scripts.gen-types:promotion: docker compose exec promotion python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > promotion-schema.json && openapi-typescript promotion-schema.json -o src/types/promotion-api.d.ts && rm promotion-schema.json
scripts.gen-types:customer: docker compose exec customer python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > customer-schema.json && openapi-typescript customer-schema.json -o src/types/customer-api.d.ts && rm customer-schema.json
scripts.gen-types:notification: docker compose exec notification python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > notification-schema.json && openapi-typescript notification-schema.json -o src/types/notification-api.d.ts && rm notification-schema.json

scripts.gen-types:reporting: docker compose exec reporting python manage.py spectacular --format openapi-json > reporting-schema.json && openapi-typescript reporting-schema.json -o src/types/reporting-api.d.ts && rm reporting-schema.json
